product_name: Lowa Zephyr GTX Mid Hiking Boots - Men's
long_description: With lightweight, supportive midsole frames and waterproof, breathable linings, the Lowa Zephyr GTX Mid hiking boots keep your feet protected from uneven, soggy trails. GORE-TEX(R) liners make these boots waterproof yet breathable, for comfort in a variety of conditions. Polyurethane MONOWRAP(R) frames wrap around your feet to provide lateral stability; integrated polyurethane midsoles deliver amazing shock absorption. Split-grain leather uppers feature durable Cordura(R) nylon panels for enhanced breathability; synthetic mesh linings wick moisture away from your feet, keeping them dry. 3/4-length, stabilizing nylon shanks provide stiffness and support underfoot. Durable rubber outsoles provide sure-footed traction on mixed terrain.
short_description: With lightweight, supportive midsole frames and waterproof, breathable linings, the Lowa Zephyr GTX Mid hiking boots keep your feet protected from uneven, soggy trails.
